tool_description:
Broadage Soccer API brings a wide range of data for Soccer in fixtures, livescores, standings and many more. Team, tournament or match, retrieve real time data for any perspective you need. Our Soccer Coverage includes 350+ tournaments from all around the world with in-depth coverage, giving the chance to present the best sports data from users located anywhere.
This is a limited version in RapidApi. Please, click here to start your Free Trial and try the endpoints with live data now!
name: Soccer Data
title: Soccer Data

api_list.name: Red Card Leaderboard
api_list.description: List of players shown most red cards of the competition supported with player stats.

api_list.name: Team Squad
api_list.description: List of players in a team.

optional_parameters.name: tournamentId
optional_parameters.description: The id of the tournament. Tournament id is optional for club teams. However, it is required for national teams.

api_list.name: Daily Match List-Results
api_list.description:
Daily match list including finished matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}.

api_list.name: Daily Match List-All
api_list.description:
Daily match list including scheduled, live and finished matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}.

api_list.name: Yellow Card Leaderboard
api_list.description: List of players shown most yellow cards of the competition supported with player stats.

api_list.name: Tournament Teams
api_list.description: List of teams participating in a specific tournament.

api_list.name: Tournament Info
api_list.description: Current season, stage structure(groups,knockout stages etc.), country and many more information about a tournament.

api_list.name: Daily Match List-Scheduled
api_list.description:
Daily match list including scheduled matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}.

api_list.name: Goal Leaderboard
api_list.description: Top scorers of the competition supported with player stats.

api_list.name: Match Events
api_list.description:
Goals, yellow cards, red cards and substitutions in a match.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Tournament Standings
api_list.description: Team Rankings for a specific competition.

api_list.name: Team Squad with Stats
api_list.description: List of players in a team with their respective stats.

optional_parameters.name: tournamentId
optional_parameters.description: The id of the tournament. Tournament id is optional for club teams. However, it is required  for National Teams.

api_list.name: Team Schedule
api_list.description: Team fixtures by all the tournaments a team participates.

api_list.name: Match Events-All
api_list.description:
All of the events occuring in a match.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Daily Match List-Live
api_list.description:
Daily match list including live matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}.

api_list.name: Match Commentary
api_list.description:
Live event based commentary with texts and events.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Missing Player List
api_list.description:
List of injured and suspended players for the matches in a specific date.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today +- 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date of the matches. The format is 	{dd/MM/yyyy}.

api_list.name: Match Lineup
api_list.description:
Team lineups, formations and head coaches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Match Statistics
api_list.description:
Live in match team statistics for each team in a match.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Match Summary
api_list.description:
Match scores, match status, team names, stadium, referee and weather forecast.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Seasonal Market Statistics: Goals
api_list.description:
Provides under/over, both team to score and also total goals statistics of the team in the tournament.

P.S.
Full data is available at Seasonal Market Statistics: Goals endpoint but can not be shown in mock response.

api_list.name: Market Tables: Under/Over
api_list.description:
Provides under/over statistics of the teams in the tournament, ordered by the tournament standings.

P.S.
Full data is available at Market Tables: Under/Over endpoint but can not be shown in mock response.

api_list.name: Market Tables: Total Goals
api_list.description:
Provides total goals statistics of the teams in the tournament, ordered by the tournament standings.

P.S.
Full data is available at Market Tables: Total Goals endpoint but can not be shown in mock response.

api_list.name: Market Tables: Both Teams to Score
api_list.description:
Provides both team to score statistics of the teams in the tournament, ordered by the tournament standings.

P.S.
Full data is available at Market Tables: Both Teams to Score endpoint but can not be shown in mock response.

api_list.name: Referee Statistics
api_list.description:
Provides the information about referee and his/her statistics.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Goal Analysis: Scoring First in Between
api_list.description:
Provides the scoring first goal statistics of the teams between in the minutes intervals(0-10, 11-20, 21-30...etc.)

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.

api_list.name: Seasonal Goal Analysis: Goal Conceded Minutes
api_list.description: Provides the goal conceded goal statistics of the teams against to other teams in the tournament in the minutes intervals(0-10, 11-20, 21-30...etc.)

api_list.name: Seasonal Goal Analysis: Goal Minutes
api_list.description:
Provides the goals statistics of the teams against to the other teams(in tournament) in the minutes intervals(0-10, 11-20, 21-30...etc.)

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.

api_list.name: Recent Match List
api_list.description:
Provides the result list of the last 20 matches between the two teams in overall, with home and away filters.

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.

P.S.
Full data is available at Recent Match List endpoint but can not be shown in mock response.

api_list.name: Market Statistics: Goals
api_list.description:
Provides the market goals statistics which are “Both Teams to Score”, “Under/Over” and also “Total Goals” for both two teams against the other teams in the tournament.

P.S.
Full data is available at Market Statistics: Goals endpoint but can not be shown in mock response.

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.

api_list.name: Seasonal Statistics: Goals
api_list.description: Provides the goal statistics of the team in the tournament.

api_list.name: Seasonal Goal Analysis: Conceding First
api_list.description:
Provides the conceding first goal statistics of the teams against to other teams in the tournament in the minutes intervals(0-10, 11-20, 21-30...etc.)

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.

api_list.name: Result Statistics
api_list.description:
Provides the result list of the last 20 matches between the two teams in overall, with home and away filters.

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.

api_list.name: Team Streaks
api_list.description:
Provides the streaks(winning, draw, losing...etc.) of both two teams in tournament.

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.

api_list.name: Goal Analysis: Goal Minutes in Between
api_list.description:
Provides the goals statistics of the teams between in the minutes intervals(0-10, 11-20, 21-30...etc.)

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.

api_list.name: Seasonal Goal Analysis: Scoring First
api_list.description:
Provides the scoring first goal statistics of the teams against to other teams in tournaments in the minutes intervals(0-10, 11-20, 21-30...etc.)

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Soccer Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Tournament List
api_list.description: Provides list of tournaments.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://soccer-data.p.rapidapi.com/tournament/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soccer-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://soccer-data.p.rapidapi.com/tournament/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soccer-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tournament Fixture
api_list.description: Full match list with half time and final scores, with additional info for each match such as referee and stadium.

api_list.name: Assist Leaderboard
api_list.description: Provides assist leaderboard data of the tournament.
